<head>

<style>
body {font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;}
* {box-sizing: border-box;}

input[type=text], select, textarea {
  width: 75%;
  padding: 12px;
  border-radius: 4px;
  box-sizing: border-box;
  margin-top: 6px;
  margin-bottom: 16px;
  resize: vertical;
}

button[type=submit] {
  padding: 12px 20px;
  border: none;
  border-radius: 4px;
  cursor: pointer;
  color: black;
}

button[type=submit]:hover {
}

.container {
  border-radius: 5px;
  padding: 20px;
}
</style>
</head>

<body>
<br>
<h4>Contact Form</h4>

<div class="container">
  <form action="https://formspree.io/f/xjvlaakl" method="POST">
    <label for="email">Your email:</label>
    <br>
    <input type="text" id="email" name="email" placeholder="itsame@mario.it">

    <label for="message">Message</label>
    <br>
    <textarea id="mesasge" name="message" placeholder="Yahoo!" style="height:200px"></textarea>
    <br>
    <!-- your other form fields go here -->
    <button type="submit">Send</button>
  </form>
</div><br>
